channel.title: VPS run.bat helppp!
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.awt.HeadlessException at java.awt.GraphicsEnvironment.checkHeadless(GraphicsEnvironment.java:173) at java.awt.Window.<init>(Window.java:476) at java.awt.Frame.<init>(Frame.java:419) at java.awt.Frame.<init>(Frame.java:384) at javax.swing.JFrame.<init>(JFrame.java:174) at server.util.ControlPanel.<init>(ControlPanel.java:20) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:49) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.[/code]
I keep getting this and idk what to do anymore. I've been searching for days!

you can’t use any sort of ui on a headless server. this means if you have some sort of swing management system, disable it.[/quote]

item.title: VPS run.bat helppp!
item.dc:creator: @omfgamrange omfgamrange
item.description:
@omfgamrange wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:3, topic:455593”]http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/awt/HeadlessException.html

Thrown when code that is dependent on a keyboard, display, or mouse is called in an environment that does not support a keyboard, display, or mouse.

Server is trying to create a UI when the VPS doesn’t currently support it.[/quote]

How do I fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: VPS run.bat helppp!
item.dc:creator: @cdj cdj
item.description:
@cdj wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:3, topic:455593”]http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/awt/HeadlessException.html

Thrown when code that is dependent on a keyboard, display, or mouse is called in an environment that does not support a keyboard, display, or mouse.

Server is trying to create a UI when the VPS doesn’t currently support it.[/quote][quote=“I_Hybrid_I, post:2, topic:455593”]Edit your run.bat, amd change it to your java version.[/quote]

none of t hese work. can u guy’s… tv me? or something … i really need help i installed jjdk to my… vps. all i need is to run my server i need help…
